Subject: RE: Adding new business categories

 

Hello everyone,


For Fertilizers and Meat I propose keeping the same icons we are using now.

*	For Biofuels I have two icon proposals:
	Proposal 1 : Fuel can with plant icon

 



 

Proposale 2 : Fuel can with word 'Bio' 

 



 

*	For EU/ Black Fryers I have two  6 icons proposals :

Proposal 1: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Stroked with border)

 



 

Proposal 2: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Filled)

 



 

Proposal 3: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Filled)

For Fertilizers and Meat I propose keeping the same icons we are using now.

	Proposal 1 : Fuel can with plant icon

 



 

Proposale 2 : Fuel can with word 'Bio' 

 



 

*	For EU/ Black Fryers I have two  6 icons proposals :

Proposal 1: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Stroked with border)

 



 

Proposal 2: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Filled)

 



 

Proposal 3: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Filled) 

 



 

Proposal 4: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Stroked without border, I can do it with border)

 



 

Proposal 5: Combination between Dnext Logo, EU flag stars  and a bar chart icon ( this one is Filled, I can do a stroked version)

 



 

Proposal 6: Cobination between database icon and stars that look similar to EU flag stars

 



Looking forward for your feedback!
Best Regards,

Nour El Houda Jawedi

Hello everyone,


For Fertilizers and Meat I propose keeping the same icons we are using now.

  • For Biofuels I have two icon proposals:
    Proposal 1 : Fuel can with plant icon

 

 

Proposale 2 : Fuel can with word 'Bio' 

 

 

  • For EU/ Black Fryers I have two  6 icons proposals :

Proposal 1: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Stroked with border)

 

 

Proposal 2: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Filled)

 

 

Proposal 3: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Filled) 

 

 

Proposal 4: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Stroked without border, I can do it with border)

 

 

Proposal 5: Combination between Dnext Logo, EU flag stars  and a bar chart icon ( this one is Filled, I can do a stroked version)

 

 

Proposal 6: Cobination between database icon and stars that look similar to EU flag stars

 

Looking forward for your feedback!
Best Regards,

Nour El Houda Jawedi

Hello everyone,


For Fertilizers and Meat I propose keeping the same icons we are using now.

*	For Biofuels I have two icon proposals:
	Proposal 1 : Fuel can with plant icon

 



 

Proposale 2 : Fuel can with word 'Bio' 

 



 

*	For EU/ Black Fryers I have two  6 icons proposals :

Proposal 1: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Stroked with border)

 



 

Proposal 2: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Filled)

 



 

Proposal 3: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Filled) 

 



 

Proposal 4: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Stroked without border, I can do it with border)

 



 

Proposal 5: Combination between Dnext Logo, EU flag stars  and a bar chart icon ( this one is Filled, I can do a stroked version)

 



 

Proposal 6: Cobination between database icon and stars that look similar to EU flag stars

 



Looking forward for your feedback!
Best Regards,

Nour El Houda Jawedi

Hello everyone,


For Fertilizers and Meat I propose keeping the same icons we are using now.

  • For Biofuels I have two icon proposals:
    Proposal 1 : Fuel can with plant icon

 

 

Proposale 2 : Fuel can with word 'Bio' 

 

 

  • For EU/ Black Fryers I have two  6 icons proposals :

Proposal 1: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Stroked with border)

 

 

Proposal 2: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Filled)

 

 

Proposal 3: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Filled) 

 

 

Proposal 4: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Stroked without border, I can do it with border)

 

 

Proposal 5: Combination between Dnext Logo, EU flag stars  and a bar chart icon ( this one is Filled, I can do a stroked version)

 

 

Proposal 6: Cobination between database icon and stars that look similar to EU flag stars

 

Looking forward for your feedback!
Best Regards,

Nour El Houda Jawedi

Hello everyone,


For Fertilizers and Meat I propose keeping the same icons we are using now.

*	For Biofuels I have two icon proposals:
	Proposal 1 : Fuel can with plant icon

 



 

Proposale 2 : Fuel can with word 'Bio' 

 



 

*	For EU/ Black Fryers I have two  6 icons proposals :

Proposal 1: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Stroked with border)

 



 

Proposal 2: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Filled)

 



 

Proposal 3: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Filled) 

 



 

Proposal 4: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Stroked without border, I can do it with border)

 



 

Proposal 5: Combination between Dnext Logo, EU flag stars  and a bar chart icon ( this one is Filled, I can do a stroked version)

 



 

Proposal 6: Cobination between database icon and stars that look similar to EU flag stars

 



Looking forward for your feedback!
Best Regards,

Nour El Houda Jawedi

Hello everyone,


For Fertilizers and Meat I propose keeping the same icons we are using now.

  • For Biofuels I have two icon proposals:
    Proposal 1 : Fuel can with plant icon

 

 

Proposale 2 : Fuel can with word 'Bio' 

 

 

  • For EU/ Black Fryers I have two  6 icons proposals :

Proposal 1: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Stroked with border)

 

 

Proposal 2: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Filled)

 

 

Proposal 3: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Filled) 

 

 

Proposal 4: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Stroked without border, I can do it with border)

 

 

Proposal 5: Combination between Dnext Logo, EU flag stars  and a bar chart icon ( this one is Filled, I can do a stroked version)

 

 

Proposal 6: Cobination between database icon and stars that look similar to EU flag stars

 

Looking forward for your feedback!
Best Regards,

Nour El Houda Jawedi

Hello everyone,


For Fertilizers and Meat I propose keeping the same icons we are using now.

  • For Biofuels I have two icon proposals:
    Proposal 1 : Fuel can with plant icon

 

 

Proposale 2 : Fuel can with word 'Bio' 

 

 

  • For EU/ Black Fryers I have two  6 icons proposals :

Proposal 1: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Stroked with border)

 

 

Proposal 2: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Filled)

 

 

Proposal 3: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Filled) 

 

 

Proposal 4: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Stroked without border, I can do it with border)

 

 

Proposal 5: Combination between Dnext Logo, EU flag stars  and a bar chart icon ( this one is Filled, I can do a stroked version)

 

 

Proposal 6: Cobination between database icon and stars that look similar to EU flag stars

 

Looking forward for your feedback!
Best Regards,

Nour El Houda Jawedi

Hello Nour,

 

Thank you for your kind message.

 

I was commenting the icon on the left side.

 

I like the n.1 as well.

 

I would suggest maybe adding a little more thickness to the blue line distinguishing the leaf from the barrel, so that the leaf may stand out more in a small format.

 

 


Best,

 

Enea

Proposale 2 : Fuel can with word 'Bio' 

 



 

*	For EU/ Black Fryers I have two  6 icons proposals :

Proposal 1: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Stroked with border)

 



 

Proposal 2: EU flag stars + bar chart icon (Filled)

 



 

Proposal 3: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Filled) 

 



 

Proposal 4: EU flag stars + Pie chart icon (Stroked without border, I can do it with border)

 



 

Proposal 5: Combination between Dnext Logo, EU flag stars  and a bar chart icon ( this one is Filled, I can do a stroked version)

 



 

Proposal 6: Cobination between database icon and stars that look similar to EU flag stars

 



Looking forward for your feedback!
Best Regards,

Nour El Houda Jawedi

Looking forward for your feedback!
